title: Announcement, Nu-Bodies, 1987
signed: Signature imprinted in black ink at left center, verso: Design: Edward Fella, Cranbrook
inscribed:
Recto: Imprinted in black across left quadrant: MARK TUCKER/ R. TIM MILLER/ LINDA KENNEDY/ SUSAN CARMAN; across right quadrant:MARK TUCKER/ R. TIM MILLER/ LINDA KENNEDY/ SUSAN CARMAN; left edge, center, running upward, sideways: MARCH 20 APRIL 17 1987/; across center: Review Committee Selects: NU-BODIES; across lower half of sheet at various angles: Gallery Hours:/ Wednesday- Saturday/ Noon to 6 p.m./ MARCH 20 APRIL 17 1987/ Opening Reception:/ March 20/ Friday/ 6:00-8:30 p.m.; lower left edge, running upward, sideways: DETROIT/ FOCUS; lower left edge running downward, sideways: GALLERY/ 743 Beaubien, 3rd Floor Detroit Michigan 48226/ (313) 962-9025; lower right edge, running upward, sideways: While you are in the area you may wish to attend/ 3-2D Sculpture + Drawings, March 23-April 17, 1987, at the Detroit Artists Market 5:00-7:30 p.m. 
Recto: Imprinted in black across center, running upward, sideways: NU-BODIES; across lower left quadrant at various angles: Detroit Focus Gallery/ 743 Beaubien, 3rd Floor/ Detroit, Michigan 48226/ With the support of the National Endowment for the Arts/ the Michigan Council for the Arts/ Detroit Council of the Arts; across lower right quadrant: Non-profit Org./ Bulk Rate/ U.S. Postage/ PAID/ Detroit, MI/ Permit No. 2960
description:
Poster/ announcement printed in black for Detroit Focus Gallery exhibition, designed to be mailed.  Text in variety of sizes, styles, distorted and bent.    
Recto: Across upper left quadrant, in an arch shape, text giving artists' names.  Across upper right quadrant, in arch, text giving artists' names (like a mirror image).  Across center, text giving exhibition title, dates.  Across lower half of sheet, text giving reception, contact, and additional information.  Throughout sheet, imagery of spheres and parts of spheres.   
Verso: Across center, text giving exhibition title, image of partial sphere. Lower half of sheet, text giving sponsor and mailing information, abstract line design.

tombstone.epitaph:
Announcement, Nu-Bodies, 1987. Offset lithograph on gray paper.. 
Gift of Edward Fella. 1995-42-34
